snippet: Mark Zuckerberg proclaimed in a letter to potential investors that his company "was built to accomplish a social mission - to make the world more open and connected," Somini Sengupta and Claire Cain Miller report in The New York Times.
abstract: Mark Zuckerberg proclaimed in a letter to potential investors that his company "was built to accomplish a social mission - to make the world more open and connected," Somini Sengupta and Claire Cain Miller report in The New York Times.
